Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: ED
Reviews.Content: Not a big techno guy so I don't want a smart phone.  Also don't want to be locked in to a long contract.  Just wanted a basic pre paid phone with a slide out qwerty keyboard. This phone was just what I was looking for. Easy to set up and use. Great for texting and making calls. Not many bells and whistles but then again I don't need them.  Only downside so far is needing to charge the battery every other night.A good basic phone for the money.  I would have no problem recommending this phone to someone.

Reviews.Title: as expected from a used phone
Reviews.Author: Ann Marie Curtis
Reviews.Content: after only having it a few months people have complained they can't hear me very well, and that I keep breaking up.  I'm not surprised.  It was a used phone….
